Name: Dyevitchka
Ingredients: 3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Pineapple replaces cranberry in this Cosmopolitan -like cocktail.
History: 'Dyevitchka', the Russian word for 'young woman', became known in the West due to its being used in the 1971 novel A Clockwork Orange .
Nutrition: One serving of Dyevitchka contains 160 calories
